adminLoginDesc: Sign in to your admin account to access your dashboard.

features.fastDeliveryDesc: Decentralized pickup points across Algeria for faster, more reliable deliveries.
features.localPartnershipsDesc: Empowering local businesses as relay points, creating economic opportunities.
features.secureTrackedDesc: Complete tracking from pickup to delivery with secure PIN/QR verification.
features.costEffectiveDesc: Reduce failed delivery costs and optimize logistics for all parties.
